'''Sandile''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''メグロコ''' ''Meguroco'') is a dual-type {{2t|Ground|Dark}} {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It [[Evolution|evolves]] into {{p|Krokorok}} starting at [[level]] 29, which evolves into {{p|Krookodile}} starting at level 40.

==Biology==
Sandile is a short, quadruped with a long snout and tail. Its body is mostly light brown with the exception of black stripes crossing over and under its legs and its pink underbelly. It has a black stripe on its snout in front of its eyes, and black covering the tip of its tail. Its eyes resemble shaded binoculars and are shrouded in black all around their front. The black is a membrane that prevents sand from getting in Sandile's eyes and helps it see in the harsh desert sun. Its long snout is tipped by two protruding nostrils, and its mouth comprises the bottom half. Its feet are flat and contain three sharp, black claws. They are attached to stubby legs on its sides.

Sandile is only found in deserts. It usually burrows under the surface, with only its nose and eyes above the sand. Due to being so close to the surface, it can move around the desert and allow the heat of the sand to regulate its body temperature. As seen [[BW003|in the anime]], in the wild, Sandile can be mischievous and potentially troublesome to humans. However, Sandile will protect another of its species, and can be caring at times. Sandile is known to prey on {{p|Trapinch}}.

==In the anime==
[[File:Sunglasses Sandile crying.png|thumb|left|250px|Sandile in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
===={{AP|Sunglasses Sandile|Krookodile}}====
A group of Sandile lead by a {{AP|Sandile wearing sunglasses|Krookodile}} appeared in ''[[BW003|A Sandile Gusher of Change!]]'', trying to lead a bunch of Pokémon to safety. It reappeared in ''[[BW012|Here Comes the Trubbish Squad!]]'', and then in ''[[BW020|Dancing With the Ducklett Trio!]]'', in which it evolved into {{p|Krokorok}}. It was eventually caught by {{Ash}} in ''[[BW065|Battling the Bully!]]''. Later, in ''[[BW092|Ash, Iris and Trip: Then There Were Three!]]'', it evolved into a {{p|Krookodile}} during a battle against [[Iris's Dragonite]].

===Minor appearances===
Sandile has made cameo appearances in ''[[BW006|Dreams by the Yard Full!]]'', ''[[BW010|A Rival Battle for Club Champ!]]'', ''[[BW019|A Connoisseur's Revenge!]]'', ''[[BW051|Lost at the Stamp Rally!]]'', ''[[BW052|Ash Versus the Champion!]]'', ''[[BW053|A Maractus Musical!]]'', ''[[BW057|The Mighty Accelguard to the Rescue!]]'', and ''[[BW067|Cilan Takes Flight!]]''.

A {{pkmn|Trainer}}'s Sandile appeared in ''[[BW069|Climbing the Tower of Success!]]''.

A Sandile appeared in ''[[BW081|Crisis at Ferroseed Research!]]''.

Multiple Sandile appeared in ''[[BW085|All for the Love of Meloetta!]]''.

A Sandile briefly appeared in the {{OBP|elder|Village of Dragons}}'s flashback in ''[[BW100|A Village Homecoming!]]''.

A Trainer's Sandile appeared in ''[[BW112|Team Plasma's Pokémon Power Plot!]]''.

A Sandile appeared in a fantasy or a flashback in ''[[BW134|The Journalist from Another Region!]].''

A Trainer's Sandile appeared in ''[[XY039|Summer of Discovery!]]'', ''[[XY041|Foggy Pokémon Orienteering!]]'', and ''[[XY042|Battling Into the Hall of Fame!]]'' .

A Trainer's Sandile appeared in ''[[SM001|Alola to New Adventure!]]''.

Multiple Sandile appeared in ''[[SM046|Deceiving Appearances!]]''.

===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
A Sandile is one of the Pokémon employed by {{adv|White}} in her BW Agency. Apparently, it can cry on cue. It first appeared in ''[[PS465|Lights, Camera...Action]]''.

A Sandile appeared in a fantasy in ''[[PS466|An Odd Speech]]''.

A Trainer's Sandile appeared in ''[[PS513|Into the Quarterfinals!]]''.

A Sandile liberated by [[Team Plasma]] appeared in a flashback in ''[[PS529|Pokédex Lecture]]''.

===In the Pocket Monsters BW: The Heroes of Fire and Thunder manga===
A Sandile is owned by [[Togari]], a {{tc|Team Plasma Grunt}}. It was used in Togari's first battle against {{OBP|Shin|FAT}}, who was rescuing a girl's {{p|Cottonee}} from him.

==Trivia==
* No other Pokémon have the same [[List of Pokémon with unique type combinations|type combination]] as Sandile and its {{p|Krookodile|evolutionary}} {{p|Krokorok|relatives}}.

===Origin===
Sandile seems to be based on a {{wp|crocodile}}; it has traits from both the {{wp|slender-snouted crocodile}} and the {{wp|spectacled caiman}}. Its striped design is similar to a stereotypical burglar. Based on its Pokédex entry, it also seems to be inspired by a {{wp|Scincus scincus|sandfish}}, a desert skink that's able to "swim" through the sand.

====Name origin====
Sandile is a combination of ''{{wp|sand}}'' and ''{{wp|crocodile}}'' and also a play on ''sandal'', which is footwear used for walking on sand.

Meguroco may be a combination of 目黒 ''meguro'' (black-eyed) and ''crocodile''.
